attributes.action: a referendum in whole of UK - "Should Scotland be part of the UK"
attributes.background: because anything offered by the UK Government is never enough for the SNP, they want the security blanket of the UK yet also want all the power, then refuse to use the power they have , and continue to blame "Westminster"

rejection.details:
I'm sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/108429

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
